message.body: Hello again
Yesssassss
Haha how are you? Look at this system trying to keep us apart for hours on end
This is the technologically current version of locking people in a room together. How is your day?
haha I hope you don't hate it that much. Also you could not respond if you wanted. But I like the imagery
Not as in punishment, but rather sociological experimentation. Though they say its for linguistics...anyway, it's not bad, it helps to interrupt banal computer work
I got "it helps interrupt anal computer work".... didn't know you were in such a specific field.
The world needs specialists. That should have been banal. Texts are like Rorschach images
So you make these banal images that are essentially ink blots?
Yeah and then I sell them to ikea. It's pretty lucrative
And then you get yo hang out with Rorschach afterwards?
I pour the first sip of my forty out for Rorschach
But he isn't dead
Maybe we are talking about two different Rorschachs
Have you seen the movie the watchmen? I suppose the character and the original test must be based on a real guy, who must be dead, which makes your actions totally appropriate
The character was pulverized by dr manhattan at the end of the comic. I think at the end of the movie too
O. You are right again. Man I was not paying enough attention at the end of that movie. Maybe I should drink more fortys
I've read the graphic novel too many times, it's burned into my brain
You are interesting mugsy. Do you read a lot of graphic novels? Do you play video games? Most importantly, do you go on reddit?
I don't read a lot of graphic novels, but I like anything by Allen Moore or Jesse Moynihan. Not really to video games, unless it's in an arcade. Reddit sometimes, but just when I am killing time.
Arcades? Do they have alot of those in Philly? I feel like they aren't really a thing anymore. I did like the movie wreck it Ralph though. So you actually sell paintings to IKEA?
